description: Made the song from the one step down tuning in which it was recorded, added some stuff from other tabs to try to get it as accurate as possible
title: Dear God

description: I fixed the names (Zacky and no Zachy, Johnny and no Johny, and The Rev and no drumkit), I converted overdriven guitars into distorsion. I changed some names, converted Johnny's bass to fingers. Corrected the grammar errors. I fixed a lot of errors which were reported down.
title: Dear God
